com.noctarius.borabora.spi.builder

Interface EncoderContext


  • public interface EncoderContext
    The EncoderContext supports encoding values into a CBOR stream. It keeps track of the offsets and Output instance. The encoders main purpose is to keep the actual implementations of Writers stateless and thread-safe but to handle the non-stateless parts inside the EncoderContext.

    Furthermore the EncoderContext knows about the semantic tag encoders that are registered with the Writer instance and can apply them accordingly.

    It also offers additional convenience methods like encodeNull(), encodeNullOrType(Object, EncoderFunction) or a generalized form for more customized encoding encode(EncoderFunction).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  EncoderContext.EncoderFunction
      The EncoderFunction interface defines an encoder to bind and write a value to a certain location inside the generated CBOR stream.

      long applyEncoder(Object value, long offset)
      Tries to apply one of the registered TagEncoder instances.
      default void encode(EncoderContext.EncoderFunction encoderFunction)
      Encodes a value bound in the given EncoderContext.EncoderFunction to the current position in the CBOR stream.
      default void encodeNull()
      Encodes a null-type at the current position in the CBOR stream.
      default void encodeNullOrType(Object value, EncoderContext.EncoderFunction encoderFunction)
      Encodes the given value as either a null-type (if the value if null) or with the given EncoderContext.EncoderFunction.

      Returns the TagStrategy for the given semantic tag type or null if no TagStrategy is found for that very type.

      Returns the current offset of the generated CBOR stream.

    • Method Detail

      • output

        Output output()
        Returns the bound Output instance the generated CBOR stream is written to.
        Returns:
        the bound output

      • offset

        void offset(long offset)

        Parameters:
        offset - the new offset

      • applyEncoder

        long applyEncoder(Object value,
                  long offset)
        Tries to apply one of the registered TagEncoder instances. Only the first matching encoder is used. If an ambiguous configuration exists, results might vary and the outcome is undefined. However if an item can be encoded into two different ways, there might not be a problem according to the CBOR specification.

        If not matching TagEncoder can be found a WrongTypeException is thrown.

        Parameters:
        value - the value to encode
        offset - the current offset
        Returns:
        the new offset after writing the tag
        Throws:
        WrongTypeException - if no matching TagEncoder was found

      • findTagStrategy

        <S> TagStrategy findTagStrategy(Class<S> type)
        Returns the TagStrategy for the given semantic tag type or null if no TagStrategy is found for that very type.
        Type Parameters:
        S - the type of the semantic tag class
        Parameters:
        type - the semantic tag object class
        Returns:
        the TagStrategy for the given type if available, otherwise null
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when type is null

      • encodeNullOrType

        default void encodeNullOrType(Object value,
                              EncoderContext.EncoderFunction encoderFunction)
        Encodes the given value as either a null-type (if the value if null) or with the given EncoderContext.EncoderFunction. If the given EncoderFunction is null a NullPointerException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to encode
        encoderFunction - the EncoderFunction to be used for encoding the value
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if encoderFunction is null

      • encodeNull

        default void encodeNull()
        Encodes a null-type at the current position in the CBOR stream.

      • encode

        default void encode(EncoderContext.EncoderFunction encoderFunction)
        Encodes a value bound in the given EncoderContext.EncoderFunction to the current position in the CBOR stream. If the given EncoderFunction is null a NullPointerException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        encoderFunction - the encoder function to write the actual value
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if encoderFunction is null
